title: http.ServerMux should be extendable to specify the matcher
body:
by **bique.alexandre**: 
Hi,

ServerMux is using custom pattern matching which will never go for HTTP 404 "not
found".

Maybe we could extend it by adding a Matcher which can be based on fnmatch or regexp,
and a Sorter for the patterns ?

The ServeMux should execute the first handler which match.

What do you think ?


Thanks a lot!
